Description: Sets the path to the directory containing all modules. If it does not exist, it will be created when the server is run. Alternatively, specify an array of individual module file paths (using valid JSON format) in the Modules setting in appsettings.json
Sets the path to the directory containing all binary (dll) dependencies. If it does not exist, it will be created when the server is run
Sets the path to the directory containing all module and per-server module configuration files. If it does not exist, it will be created when the server is run
If required, you can change the IP binding of the server by editing App.ApplicationIPBinding in GenericModule.kvp for the instance. Stop the instance (not just the server) first

EnumValues.Sockets: Output logs from low level sockets
EnumValues.GameServerErrors: Previous + output logs from remote game server
EnumValues.GameServers: Previous + output logs of game server connects, reconnects
EnumValues.Players: Previous + output logs of player connects, disconnects
EnumValues.Squads: Previous + output logs of squad changes
EnumValues.Roles: Previous + output logs of role changes
EnumValues.HealtChanges: Previous + output logs of player health changes

Description: Sets the time period after which a warning is logged if a server method on a module takes too long
Sets the [ASP.NET Core 6.0 version](https://dotnet.microsoft.com/en-us/download/dotnet/6.0) to install. Back up configuration and update the server!
